name: crafter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who makes decorative objects with their hands, especially as a hobby: She is a keen crafter who enjoys making jewellery and fabric bags.
someone who skilfully creates something such as a story: As an expert crafter of fiction, she has good advice for young writers.
More examplesFewer examplesA longtime crafter named Jean argued that making something yourself is a form of "political statement" and a protest against chain stores.They sell fabric, beads, ribbon, everything for the home crafter. My mother was not a sewer or a crafter.He is well-known as a crafter of topical political plays.She is best known as a crafter of detective fiction.
